title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.127 - Tear gas or irritating substance, Class C
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.127 - Tear gas or irritating substance, Class C
State Regulations

No vehicle shall enter either a tunnel, the George

Washington Bridge Lower Level or George Washington Bridge Expressway if its
load includes any liquid classified as a tear gas or irritating substance, Class C except there shall be no restrictions on the transportation of gas
identification sets, loaded or empty. Empty containers which last contained a
poisonous liquid classified as a tear gas or irritating substance, Class C, are
not allowed passage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1211.127

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
